    Guidebook

    On the Provisional Constitution of Somalia

    Guidebook →

    NOTE

    Prepared By the UNDP/UNPOS Joint Constitution Unit

    This Guide Book is designed to aid the Somali people to become familiar with the contents of the Provisional Constitution entering into force on August 2, 2012.
